Package upei.project

package upei.project
  • Related Packages
    Package
    Description
    upei.project.Space
     
    upei.project.Strategy
     
  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    Board
    Board class represents the game board, consisting of a collection of spaces.
    BoardTest
    Unit tests for the Board class in the Monopoly game.
    Game
    Game class represents the core game logic for simulating a Monopoly-style game.
    GameTest
    Unit tests for the Game class, ensuring that the game's initialization, player management, scenarios (such as Jail and Go to Jail), and winner determination work as expected.
    Main
    Main class to initiate and start a Monopoly game simulation.
    Player
    Represents a player in the Monopoly game.
    PlayerTest
    Unit tests for the Player class.
    SimulationExperiment
    Simulates a series of Monopoly games with multiple players, collecting various statistics such as wins, balances, properties owned, and houses owned across multiple trials.
